About Me

I am an IT Senior Solution Architect at Welch‚Äôs supporting supply chain planning. Member of IT leadership team and PMO for enterprise systems. Pursuing a master‚Äôs degree in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University. Core competencies in data analysis, trade promotion planning, product information management, team building, SaaS project and solution delivery, departmental budgeting, sales forecasting, S&OP processes, and leadership.


Outside of work and school I have a lovely family which includes my wife, 1 year old son, and two cats. I enjoy the outdoors, hanging with a few friends at the pub, and following the The Arsenal Football Club wherever they go.

Taylor R. Luckenbill


39 Charnwood Rd. Apt. 3, Somerville, MA 02144 ‚óè (570) 640-6762 ‚óè tluck1531@gmail.com


Core Competencies


Business Process Improvement | Enterprise Project Portfolio Management | Trade Promotion Management | Data Analytics | Product Management | Cross Functional Team Building | Leadership | Strategic Planning | Growth Mindset | Executive Level Communication | Customer Service | Product Information Management


Professional Experience


Welch Foods Inc., Concord, MA (2020 ‚Äì Present)


Sr.¬†Solution Architect ‚Äì Supply Chain Planning



Plan to Produce IT Lead on a fifty-million-dollar transformational agenda focused on replacing legacy ERP and other legacy systems.


IT Lead for implementation of Infor Food and Beverage Suite and Advanced Supply Chain Planning, covering constraint-based supply planning, demand planning, scheduling, and recipe management.


Responsible for IT support and enhancement of the monthly S&OP cycle, developing a unified interface and reporting layer that replaced disconnected file-based processes.


Enterprise Systems PMO supporting all vendor, PO, and budget inquiries for ERP and fiscal budgets.



Sr.¬†Solution Delivery Lead ‚Äì Sales and Marketing



Sales and Marketing IT Lead on a multi-million-dollar transformational ERP agenda.


Organized and managed a cross-functional Sales and Marketing team ensuring a three-in-a-box business-led decision approach.


Completed Phase 0 analysis documenting pain points, requirements, and future state design.


Provided estimates for integration and decommissioning activities beyond ERP scope.


Socialized information to align stakeholders and ensure confidence in project direction.


Identified and formalized shadow IT functions into the IT Center of Excellence.


Implemented continuous system improvement initiatives.


Enhanced Blacksmith auto-clearing for deduction processing efficiency.


Partnered with Trade Promotions vendor to improve deduction allocation accuracy.


Created forecasting automation for raw materials using Power Query and Trade Promotion Management systems.


Transitioned reporting into Power BI for greater automation and insight.


Led Product Information Management discovery and initiated capital project for Salsify improvements.


Ensured ADA compliance for corporate website.


Developed solution architects aligned with career goals and competency expansion.


Assisted in recovery planning and remediation post-cyber attack.



Solution Delivery Lead ‚Äì Sales and Marketing



Oversaw IT people, processes, and technology for Sales and Marketing functions.


Served as SME on Product Information and Trade Promotion Management systems (Blacksmith, Oracle, Salsify, 1WorldSync).


Member of IT Leadership Team managing two solution architects and budgets.


Defined short- and long-term Sales & Marketing system strategies.


Supported broker commission process and ensured reporting accuracy.


Expanded IT support to category management, media spend, PLM, and customer insights.


Implemented system and process continuous improvements.


Delivered trade reporting enhancements and scenario planning automation.


Implemented Syndigo Marketplace to expand product data syndication to 100+ retailers.


Closed resourcing gaps by onboarding managed service partners for product data accuracy.



Business Process Specialist ‚Äì Sales and Marketing



Led $125k Trade Promotion Management system implementation (Blacksmith), completed on time and on budget.


Created business cases and value stream mapping yielding measurable ROI.


Restructured Welch‚Äôs customer hierarchy in Oracle ERP to eliminate input errors.


Estimated elimination of 3,000 hours/year of non-value work and $130k in trade reductions.


Ensured quality and accuracy of product information shared with retailers (Walmart, Target).


Maintained Oracle, Salsify, and 1WorldSync data integrity.


Provided IT support and Power BI automation for sales planning and accounts receivable functions.



Origlio Beverage Inc., Philadelphia, PA (2018 ‚Äì 2020)


Business Analyst



Presented migration analysis from Tableau to Amazon Quicksight, saving $15,000 annually and expanding analytics access to 200 users.


Led implementation of ADP Enhanced Time software, reducing payroll prep by one day per cycle.


Created Tableau dashboards that reduced order errors by 18,000 units annually.


Managed pricing database setup, supplier cost maintenance, and rebate validation.


Streamlined new product approval through Power Apps automation, saving one hour daily per sales rep.



The Vanguard Group, Malvern, PA (2017 ‚Äì 2018)

Analyzed market reports to inform client investment strategy.


Guided clients through asset allocation and long-term investing concepts.


Delivered above-average service quality per company metrics.


Tutored new employees on licensing exam topics and financial principles.


Led peer learning on complex financial instruments like derivatives.
